DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional ( study presence absence disease health-related variable determine member study population representative sample 1 particular time ) observational study ( scientific study make clear easy understanding cause effect relationship ) investigate health relate QoL Korean female participant chronic constipation receive treatment previously use EQ-5D ( EuroQol 5 Dimension ) , SF-36 ( Short Form Health Survey ) PAC-QoL ( Patient Assessment Constipation ) questionnaires . The duration study 6 month . Participant 's safety monitor throughout study .
